name: Panini America
fullText:
The best clubs in the world and most popular artists in the world, presented by the biggest sports and entertainment collectibles company in the world.

Proud to be the presenting partner of the @FIFACWC 2025 Final Halftime Show featuring @JBALVIN, @DojaCat, and @temsbaby.
